short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pushes user's Legendary Marketer affiliate data to Google Sheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Then use Zapier to integrate your Google sheet with a wide variety of apps, including your favorite autoresponder.  Now you can automate your follow-up with your Legendary leads and increase your affiliate commissions!

Or use the direct ActiveCampaign integration and skip using Zapier altogether.
